title: Swain's low quality snare.
body:
I have everything on Very High, but Swain's snare (W) always appears as it is on the lowest setting. It's really disgusting :(

Can anyone confirm this?

Only seen Swains with classic skin since this occured.

replies.body: I have the same problem with his W. You're not alone.
I thought his nevermove looked odd...

Hey Garurumon,

Thanks for the report! We'll load this up in game and see what's going on.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YAmgKE5v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-03T17:28:59.879+0000)
>
> Hey Garurumon,
> 
> Thanks for the report! We'll load this up in game and see what's going on.

Sounds fantastic, Kacey-Sensei!

Getting the feeling of throwing up each time I use Nevermove makes me cri evri tiem and put [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ov6htZPA4Ro) on in order to ignore all my tears of frustration.
